features: 【 IP54 Waterproof outdoor Table Lamp 】: The materials of this cordless outdoor table lamp adopt Die-casting metal aluminum. ensure the long service life of our table lamp. Meanwhile, IP54 protection level tech and unique drainage shape, no need to worry about water ingress, it can be applied to various outdoor situations. (Don't submerge the whole table lamp into water.)

【Dimmable Table Lamp 】Stepless Dimming(10%-100%); long press to control the light brightness. Selects a comfortable brightness for any space. Non-slip base allows you to put any flat surface. Suitable for outdoor camping/family gathering/dinner lighting, for you a romantic evening.

【Battery Powered table lamp】: Built-in 4800 mAh rechargeable battery, can be used for 8~24 hours when fully charged (dedpending on the brightness maintained). 3Watt ,Built-in LED light source with acrylic lampshade, offers soft, stable,eye-caring light, no stroboscopic.It will not fatigue your eyes, even after a long period of use. ​

【Minimalist Design】: Portable battery cordless table lamp, Strong and lightweight aluminum material, elegant minimalist design, 360 degree lighting.slender metal arms with matte shadows make it look stylish, could easily match the various home decor.Ideal light source for all areas like bedroom, living room, office, kids room, coffee shop, bar. Suitable for Indoor/outdoor

【AFTER-SALE SERVICE】: This perfect Table lamp will easily update your space. Perfect gift choice for family and friends on festivals, birthdays, graduation and housewarming days. Ralbay team guarantees to always provide the best quality product. If you have any questions about our products, please log in to your account, check the order ID and click "Contact Seller" to contact us. our customer service will solve your problem within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Outdoor Lamps!
reviews.reviewText: These are great little lamps - we got them to use on our porch and deck and we loved them so much when they arrived, that we immediately ordered another pair. They are heavy so low risk of tipping. They are waterproof and cordless so they’re perfect to use on an outdoor dining table. They look a bit upscale; similar to what you’d find at a restaurant that has Al fresco dining. They recharge easily overnight and are dimmable. They are meant for soft lighting not bright for like you’d need for reading. This is exactly what we wanted. We use two on porch dining table and the other two on end tables flanking wicker porch sofa. We went with the rust color and highly recommend it - it is understated and goes with everything. So glad we went with it instead of black. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light up your Life...Delightful Lights
reviews.reviewText: These lights are stylish and add just the right accent to our (yet unwired) screened porch. (Maybe we won't wire it, save a bundle). They charge fast and burn for enough time. We don't leave them on FOREVER. We pay attention. But they're great. Portable. Pretty and convenient. Just a bit pricey, but to us, worth it. Oh, the dimming feature is Super. Hope they last ! Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No hard wiring required. These little lamps are beautiful and add a touch of class.
reviews.reviewText: We found these (so many different varieties) in Sicily. They are on every outdoor table in the evenings. It took me a few weeks to totally notice them and started to examine how they worked. They get charged during the day wherever you have electrical, and then taken off of their bases and put on tables. They all had a 'touch' feature to turn them off & on, dim if needed, but they really put out the light. Sure beats the heck out of candles and you can see what you are eating. We were going to install a light fixture on our outdoor porch/dining table, but now no need. These things are no joke pretty, heavy and I love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks high end
reviews.reviewText: My husband bought this after seeing a similar lamp at a high end resort. This is a perfect dupe! Decent price, good subtle lighting and fits in with any decor. We got lots of compliments from guests who all wanted the Amazon link!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It was a present
reviews.reviewText: I liked that the person I gave it to thought it was beautiful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far it is really nice
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had it one day. I like the ease of charging. The light is heavy which is good. The light is nice. I ordered gold as I will be sending to my daughter’s house for the puzzle table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright and besautiful!
reviews.reviewText: After we bought the first set of two, we ordered another set of two. They are not only beautiful, but they are solid as well. They throw the light softly around in a lovely glow that is plenty bright, and they can be dimmed down very low as well. Operating them could not be simpler and easier, just touch the top to turn on and off and hold to dim or brighten. Charging is easy with the round charger that they just sit on with a USB cord plugged into your own plug. Waterproof, easy to carry out to the patio, on a blanket on the ground, or on your bedside table, we just love these lamps. 100% satisfied with this product, highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice quality lamps.
reviews.reviewText: Work great. I got them for bar top lighting.
